mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_rrn, gender, email, phone, user_add, user_add2, admin) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPass}, #{userName}, #{userRrn}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{userAdd}, #{userAdd2}, #{admin})
mapper.update: UPDATE users SET user_id = #{userId}, user_pass = #{userPass}, user_name = #{userName}, user_rrn = #{userRrn}, gender = #{gender}, email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, user_add = #{userAdd}, user_add2 = #{userAdd2}, admin = #{admin}, update_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_no = #{userNo}
